title: Script help please
content:
Any help with an exact match would be appreciated. Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [picture 2013-07-31 at 9.37.49 AM.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804105655/http:/typophile.com/files/picture%202013-07-31%20at%209.37.49%20AM.jpg) | 35.73 KB |
author: darksympho

comments.content: [Bickham Script Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804105655/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/bickham-script-mm/) with an alternate k (see [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804105655/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/bickham-script-mm/regular/glyphs/511753/363)). The flourish is handmade of course.
Thanks very much, I appreciate it!
